story.title: Riverside Relay
story.hubDescription: Stacked containers form a neon-lit lab above the floodline. Solar rigs, med bays, and a patched radio tower pierce the fog.
story.goal: Synthesize the Riverside serum before the river corrodes the hub.
story.gameOverMessage: Beacon’s light falters—reroute and try again.
instructions: Players explore neon labs above flooded streets
